ayahs.text: <i*aA jaA^'aka {lomuna`fiquwna qaAluwA@ na$ohadu <in~aka larasuwlu {ll~ahi wa{ll~ahu yaEolamu <in~aka larasuwluhu, wa{ll~ahu ya$ohadu <in~a {lomuna`fiqiyna laka`*ibuwna
{t~axa*uw^A@ >ayoma`nahumo jun~apF faSad~uwA@ Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi <in~ahumo saA^'a maA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna
*a`lika bi>an~ahumo 'aAmanuwA@ vum~a kafaruwA@ faTubiEa EalaY` quluwbihimo fahumo laA yafoqahuwna

wa<i*aA ra>ayotahumo tuEojibuka >ajosaAmuhumo wa<in yaquwluwA@ tasomaEo liqawolihimo ka>an~ahumo xu$ubN m~usan~adapN yaHosabuwna kul~a SayoHapK Ealayohimo humu {loEaduw~u fa{Ho*arohumo qa`talahumu {ll~ahu >an~aY` yu&ofakuwna
wa<i*aA qiyla lahumo taEaAlawoA@ yasotagofiro lakumo rasuwlu {ll~ahi law~awoA@ ru'uwsahumo wara>ayotahumo yaSud~uwna wahum m~usotakobiruwna
sawaA^'N Ealayohimo >asotagofarota lahumo >amo lamo tasotagofiro lahumo lan yagofira {ll~ahu lahumo <in~a {ll~aha laA yahodiY {loqawoma {lofa`siqiyna
humu {l~a*iyna yaquwluwna laA tunfiquwA@ EalaY` mano Einda rasuwli {ll~ahi Hat~aY` yanfaD~uwA@ walil~ahi xazaA^}inu {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wala`kin~a {lomuna`fiqiyna laA yafoqahuwna
yaquwluwna la}in r~ajaEonaA^ <ilaY {lomadiynapi layuxorijan~a {lo>aEaz~u minohaA {lo>a*al~a walil~ahi {loEiz~apu walirasuwlihi. walilomu&ominiyna wala`kin~a {lomuna`fiqiyna laA yaEolamuwna
ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA tulohikumo >amowa`lukumo walaA^ >awola`dukumo Ean *ikori {ll~ahi waman yafoEalo *a`lika fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {loxa`siruwna
wa>anfiquwA@ min m~aA razaqona`kum m~in qaboli >an ya>otiYa >aHadakumu {lomawotu fayaquwla rab~i lawolaA^ >ax~arotaniY^ <ilaY`^ >ajalK qariybK fa>aS~ad~aqa wa>akun m~ina {lS~a`liHiyna
